post.author: 강동욱
post.content:
회원중 한명이 질문해서 여기 올려 봅니다.
좋은 자료 있으신분은 답변 부탁 드립니다.


> my company expects me to build VB application using Citrix Metaframe on Windows 2000 server.
>
> My questions are
> 1. How upload files(probably kind of source code) from client machine to server machine?- I guess(I am familiar with Citrix things),the application will be running on the server.
> 2. When user enters user name and password , how to encrypt password? Is there any way to accomplish it programmatically rather than server setting?
post.title: [q] upload and password
